programme.title: Alfred Knopf (1892-1984)
programme.short_synopsis: The life of Alfred Knopf, "simply the best publisher of the twentieth century".
programme.medium_synopsis: The life of Alfred Knopf, publisher of, among others, Thomas Mann and Gabriel Garcia Marquez, and according to Cooke "simply the best publisher of the twentieth century".
